headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Albany Brigham
content:
Roadside crime is rising. The average life expectancy is falling. Now’s your chance to stay one step ahead of the statistical curve. How? With the spine-tingling Albany Brigham, this season’s must-have hearse.

So, if you want to make every commute your own funeral procession, you know who you’re gonna call: Southern San Andreas Super Autos.
